meanings.definition: A person who is the first to find or learn about something.
meanings.sent1: The discoverer of the hidden treasure was overjoyed.
meanings.sent2: The discoverer of the new species was a scientist.
meanings.sent3: The discoverer of the lost sock was hailed as a hero.
meanings.sent4: She was a discoverer of beauty in the ordinary.
meanings.sent5: The young girl felt like a discoverer exploring the attic.

meanings.definition: One who finds or comes upon something previously unknown or unseen.
meanings.sent1: The discoverer of the ancient artifact was careful in handling it.
meanings.sent2: The discoverer of the secret passage was amazed by the discovery.
meanings.sent3: The discoverer of the missing puzzle piece was relieved.
meanings.sent4: He was a discoverer of forgotten memories in old photographs.
meanings.sent5: The detective felt like a discoverer solving the case.
